name: AGENCY FOR REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT BUCURESTI-ILFOV
goal: Since 1998, the Regional Development Agency produces and delivers services of public interest under mandate of the elected local public administrations in the Bucharest-Ilfov Region. Its core business is in the field of REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT SERVICES. Its services are addressed to both the public administration (local governments and central government) and the private sector. The Agency functions under the authority of a Regional Developvent Board, formed by the representatives of the main local public administration from the region.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Regional development, cohesion funds, innovation policy, SME policy, internal market, business and industry
